en-US.title: Bubsy - Grid Planner
en-US.subtitle: The simplest IG grid planner
en-US.description:
Bubsy - Grid Planner
The Simplest Way to Plan Your Instagram Grid

Bubsy - Grid Planner is a no-frills tool designed to help you effortlessly plan your Instagram profile grid. Unlike other apps, Bubsy keeps things lightweight, secure, and refreshingly simple.

Key Features:
- Simplicity at Its Core: A clean, intuitive interface that focuses on what matters—your grid.
- Privacy First: Photos stay linked to your device’s Photos app. Nothing is stored externally.
- No Account Required: No need to log in with Instagram—or at all. Your content stays with you.

Whether you’re a casual Instagram user or a social media pro, Bubsy - Grid Planner is the easiest way to visualize and perfect your posts before you publish.

Download now and experience simplicity in grid planning!
en-US.releaseNotes: First release of application. Please email me at jake@jakegrella.com to suggest any features.
